resources.string: Seems like you don\'t have Pokemon GO installed!
Welcome, Trainer! You have Pokemon GO installed and you\'re all good to "GO" and stay safe as well :D
Be careful, Trainer! Remember to look up and stay aware of your surroundings!
Wanna donate to help me create more apps like this?
Thank you for any donation. I am a single developer with little income, so this can be used to help pay for my school and help create more cool apps :)
Safeguard is an app made by Marlon Jones to keep players of Pokemon GO safer by giving constant notifications and dialogs every 15 minutes to ensure the safety of players.
This is a test of the dialog! You\'ll see this when you first boot up the game and if you have Android 4.4 Kit-Kat, you\'ll see this every 15 minutes on screen
You don\'t have Android 5.0 or above! Because of this, the Heads-Up notifications will not work. You will instead see dialogs.

Welcome to Safeguard! This very simple app\'s goal is to keep you safe by giving you notifications or dialogs every 15 minutes while playing Pokemon GO to keep you safe and to remind you to stay aware of your surroundings. Even though no single app or software can prevent all accidents while playing Pokemon GO or any other Augmented Reality app, the goal is to at least help keep people safer while doing so.
This is a test of the Heads-Up notification! You will see this every 15 minutes when playing Pokemon GO!
